titleStmt.title: A relation of the funerall pompe, in which the body of Gustauus the Great, late King of Sweden, was carryed from the castle of Vbolgast, to the sea-side, to be transported into Swethland Together, vvith a strange apparition of the moone the night before.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] and T[homas], F[awcet] for Thom: Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop, neare White-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress.
